Knowledge Management System

KMS project is made during my time in Swiggy and serves as a repository of all the procedures and updates needed for smooth functioning of the Operations department.

The application runs on LAMP stack, uses AJAX for dynamic properties and Bootstrap is for the frontend design.

Additional plugins:

  • Summernote
  • jQuery
  • DataTables
  • Flatpickr

Key features include:

  • Search content
    • By text
    • By date
    • By custom tags
  • Notifications on new content update
  • Version based content archiving
  • Quiz
    • Linked with Content
    • Standalone
  • Discussion forum
  • User registration via internal emailId
  • Manage categories for content
  • Manage team alignment for users
  • Designation-based access for users
  • Reports for quiz scores, user access logs
